pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, March 27, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Scarborough, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Carefirst Seniors and Community Services Association to highlight Budget 2019â€™s National Dementia Strategy.

Carefirst Seniors and Community Services Association
300 Silver Star Boulevard

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive by the east entrance no later than 9:00 a.m.

Pickering, Ontario

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Pickering Public Library, and tour the Maker Space with local students.

Pickering Public Library
1 The Esplanade South

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:45 a.m.
